memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, const char *cameraId, int numEGBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: ADEuresysConfig

briefdescription.para: Configuration function to configure one camera.

detaileddescription.para:
This function need to be called once for each camera to be used by the IOC. A call to this function instantiates one object from the ADEuresys class.
portName
asyn port name to assign to the camera.
cameraId
A string identifying the camera to control.
numEGBuffers
The number of buffers to allocate in EGrabber. If set to 0 or omitted the default of 100 will be used.
maxMemory
Maximum memory (in bytes) that this driver is allowed to allocate. 0=unlimited.
priority
The EPICS thread priority for this driver. 0=use asyn default.
stackSize
The size of the stack for the EPICS port thread. 0=use asyn default.
